name: AL-LATIF MEMORIAL TRUST

address: MANDAWALI FAZALPUR, BEHIND MOTHER DAIRY PLANT,

briefDescription: Respected Sir/Madam,Greetings to all! I'm posting this profile of our Charitable Trust: Al-Latif Memorial Trust, a New Delhi (India) based Registered Trust. This NGO was established by young & enthusiastic volunteers who wanted to change the lives of poor, orphaned & underprivileged kids in Rural & Urban India by providing them Free education at Pre=School level.We are running a Free Education Center, named Iqra Learning Academy, in the Village Thanwla, Uttar Pradesh, India. This village has a population of 16,000 & area is 1 sq. km.
